mapper.select: select DISTINCT province_name as provinceName,id from t_delaer_config
select DISTINCT city_name as cityName,id from t_delaer_config where province_name = #{provinceName}
select dealer_name as dealerName,dealer_code as dealerCode,id from t_delaer_config where province_name = #{privinceName} and city_name = #{cityName}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_road_active SET mobile = #{mobile} ,province_name = #{provinceName} ,dealer_code=#{dealerCode} ,city_name = #{cityName} ,car_modal=#{carModal} ,appoint_time=#{appointTime} ,modify_time = now() WHERE id = #{id}
